title: Maple roast turkey with apple brandy gravy
ingredients: ['500ml apple juice', '5 tablespoons maple syrup', '2 1/2 tablespoons chopped fresh thyme, divided', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh marjoram, divided', '1 1/2 teaspoons lemon zest', '175g butter, softened', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 whole turkey, neck and giblets reserved', '325g chopped onion', '175g chopped celery', '200g chopped carrots', '750ml chicken or turkey stock', '4 tablespoons plain flour', '1 bay leaf', '125ml apple brandy']
